item.description: Several months ago, my boss came back from Microsoft Ignite where he ‘drank the Kool-Aid’ big time. We had been telling him about all of the amazing things that were being released to help with the move to Modern Windows Management with Windows 10 for months but he got to hear it directly from some of the experts and got really excited. One of the things he suggested looking into came from a session with Mike Nystrom and Johan Arwidmark called Expert-level Windows 10 deployment (Skip to 50:12 for driver management).
